items.title: UK seeks trade deal as Trump metal tariffs take effect
items.description: Duty on steel and aluminium imports is a major hit for some of the US's top trading partners.

items.title: Greenland's opposition wins election dominated by independence and Trump
items.description: The voting was dominated by US President Donald Trump's pledge to take over Denmark's autonomous territory.

items.title: At least 100 passengers freed from Pakistan train siege
items.description: Security forces say they have killed at least 17 militant attackers in an ongoing operation.

items.title: US set to present 30-day ceasefire offer to Russia
items.description: Ukraine says it accepts the immediate truce, and it is now up to the US to convince Russia to agree to it.

items.title: Is Trump mulling a minerals deal with conflict-hit DR Congo?
items.description: Endowed with minerals but losing ground to rebels, the Congolese government wants to boost security.
